bug.description: References to do ASR demo using wsj_mix dataset. Getting error in Data Preparation stage while following steps from ASR demo with an4 dataset in interspeech tutorial.

comments.comment: wsj_mix dataset has special ways for data preparation because it requires multiple references. Please follow the data preparation in the wsj_mix recipe. Also, the Interspeech tutorial is not intended for the multispeaker case.

<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18646215/77346440-3f9e9e00-6d5c-11ea-89e6-fb3c9ecf314f.png></denchmark-link>
After the complete installation setup mentioned at <denchmark-link:https://espnet.github.io/espnet/notebook/asr_cli.html>https://espnet.github.io/espnet/notebook/asr_cli.html</denchmark-link> . Getting this error while running wsj_mix recipe ./run.sh at Stage 0 - Data Preparation
Do you have the WSJ data? Then, you have to set the path of your WSJ data correctly instead of /export/corpora/...
WSJ data needs license. I don't have. Are there any alternative?
No. It would be better to make it by yourself by following the wsj_mix data preparation. We're creating the librispeech mixture data but it will not be finished soon.
